title: Green Dragonborn
entryLore: Descended from the cunning and deceptive green dragons of the dense forests, these dragonborn command the power of poison. They often possess a sharp mind and a talent for intrigue, reflecting the manipulative and patient nature of their draconic kin.

traits.name: Poison Breath
traits.description: When you use your [[breath_weapon|Breath Weapon]], it deals [[poison_damage|Poison damage]]. You choose whether the breath manifests as a 15-foot cone or a 30-foot line.
